xml.title: Commonplace-Book
xml.descri: Text of final group (2 numb. leaves, 3-6 p.) is in reverse. Manuscript; the first 87 leaves, written in an early hand (possibly 16th century); succeeding leaves by various hands, extending into the 19th century.
